column3: News;Siem Reap: A foreigner died in a rented room in Sangkat Sala Kamrerk
column4: Siem Reap at 21:00 on 05 December 2018 THIERRY JEAN MICHEL LOUIS STOCKER
column5: born 1959 was a French national and also a painters. Based on the research of  authorities
column6: the court’s medical team concluded that the victim died of lung cancer. The body was sent to Royal Angkor International Hospital to wait for instructions from the family.------WARNING
